alert.note: Alert for Coeur d'Alene Area; Idaho Palouse (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 10 at 4:04AM MST until January 12 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 10 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Uniontown, Worley, Plummer, Oakesdale, Hayden, Moscow, Colfax, Potlatch, Post Falls, Pullman, Coeur d`Alene, Genesee, La Crosse, Tekoa, and Rosalia. * WHEN...From late tonight through Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Winter travel conditions could impact the Thursday morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...For Thursday and Friday, an Arctic front tracking into North Idaho Thursday night and Friday will bring gusty northeast winds with areas of blowing and drifting snow and much colder temperatures.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
